text: A mɔn yi fa na saraxane bogise nun minse saraxane ra e nun burun sangatanna yɛ keden buru rate seen6.15 burun nate sena: Lɛbɛnna na a ra naxan burun nagboma ayi.  mi naxan yi, e nun buru xunne naxan nafalaxi murutu fuɲi faɲin na naxan basanxi turen na, e nun buru yilɛnlɛnxine turen saxi naxanye ma.
